channel.title: Welcome to Doks on My Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Doks on My Docs

item.title: Example Post
item.description: You can use blog posts for announcing product updates and features.

item.title: Example Guide
item.description: Guides lead a user through a specific task they want to accomplish, often with a sequence of steps. Writing a good guide requires thinking about what your users are trying to do.

item.title: Docker & Compose 101
item.description:
Goal

Provide a concise reference for essential Docker and Docker Compose commands and explain how Dockerâ€™s build cache works.

Requirements

Tool Why it’s needed
docker CLI for building, running, and managing containers
docker-compose Compose tool for multi-container application stacks
BuildKit (Optional) advanced build cache and mount caching

âœ… Docker Engine â‰¥ 19.03 for BuildKit support.

item.title: Bot: [short title here]
item.description:
Goal

Explain what this bot is doing, who runs it, and what repo(s) or services it’s tied to.

Bot Requirements

Scope/API Why it’s needed
repo Full control of private repos (issues etc.)
public_repo Public repos only
workflow Dispatch workflows
write:discussion For interacting with GitHub Discussions

âœ… Include exact GitHub token scope or GitHub App permission.

item.title: Razor Directive Order in Blazor MAUI
item.description: A consistent Razor directive order makes your components cleaner, reduces bugs, and improves readabilityâ€”especially in hybrid projects like Blazor MAUI.

client (regions, max cost, cabin class)” }, new[] { “CLT”, “ğŸ¢ Client Management”, “Add/edit clients, contact info, onboarding status, client tags” }, new[] { “USR”, “ğŸ‘¥ User Directory”, “View/edit all users per client, reset access, impersonate, audit logs” }, new[] { “PNR”, “ğŸ”– Booking References (PNRs)”, “Lookup active/reserved bookings, check ticketing deadlines, cancellations” }, new[] { endpoint health” }, new[] { “DBG”, “ğŸ§µ Debug Tools”, “Inspect raw payloads from Amadeus, webhook logs, and sandbox tokens” }, new[] { “ACT”, “ğŸ“‹ Activity Logs”, “Per-client or global: see actions taken by users/admins/support” }, new[] { “AUT”, “ğŸ” Authentication”, “Manage login methods, MFA, token expiration, client SSO configs” }, new[] { “CNF”, “ğŸ§° Configuration Center”, “Set system-wide application safely” }

item.title: FlightResultV1
Git 101
item.description:
Adding Deleted Files

Action Command
Stage a deleted file git add path/to/file
Remove and stage git rm path/to/file
All deletions git add -u or git add -u path/to/folder

Undoing Commits and Changes

Undo Last Commit (before push)

Undo the commit, but keep changes staged:

item.title: Minimum Requirements
item.description:
The JSON payload to create a new client is a DTO (CreateAvaClientDTO). The body consists of the following JSON:

Client Supported Domains

Each client must have at least one email domain associated with their account. This is done via the Ava.Terminal application:

item.title: OpenStreetMap Contribution
item.description: How to correctly display attribution when using OpenStreetMap tiles in a Blazor project, and when to use <div> or <MudText>.
